SEARCH
Package com.unifiedcontainermanager.Core

Interface ImageManager

All Known Subinterfaces:
ContainerToolStrategy
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCliStrategy, BuildahStrategy, ContainerService, DockerStrategy, PodmanStrategy
public interface ImageManager
Interface for managing container images. Defines common operations applicable across different containerization tools.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CompletableFuture<String>
    buildImage(ImageBuildConfig config, Consumer<String> outputConsumer)
    Builds an image from a Dockerfile or Containerfile.
    CompletableFuture<ImageInfo>
    inspectImage(String imageIdOrName)
    Inspects an image and returns detailed information.
    CompletableFuture<List<ImageInfo>>
    listImages()
    Lists images available locally.
    CompletableFuture<Void>
    pullImage(String imageName, String tag, Consumer<String> progressConsumer)
    Pulls an image from a registry.
    CompletableFuture<Void>
    removeImage(String imageIdOrName, boolean force, boolean pruneChildren)
    Removes an image from local storage.

  • Method Details

    • pullImage

      CompletableFuture<Void> pullImage(String imageName, String tag, Consumer<String> progressConsumer) throws ContainerManagerException
      Pulls an image from a registry.
      Parameters:
      imageName - The name of the image to pull (e.g., "ubuntu" or "[registry.hub.docker.com/library/ubuntu](https://registry.hub.docker.com/library/ubuntu)").
      tag - The tag of the image (e.g., "latest", "20.04"). If null, often defaults to "latest".
      progressConsumer - Optional consumer for progress updates during the pull.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that completes when the image pull is finished.
      Throws:
      ContainerManagerException - if pulling fails.

    • listImages

      CompletableFuture<List<ImageInfo>> listImages() throws ContainerManagerException
      Lists images available locally.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture holding a list of ImageInfo objects.
      Throws:
      ContainerManagerException - if listing fails.

    • removeImage

      CompletableFuture<Void> removeImage(String imageIdOrName, boolean force, boolean pruneChildren) throws ContainerManagerException
      Removes an image from local storage.
      Parameters:
      imageIdOrName - The ID or name/tag of the image to remove.
      force - If true, forcefully remove the image (e.g., even if containers are using it).
      pruneChildren - If true, remove dangling parent images.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that completes when the remove command is issued.
      Throws:
      ContainerManagerException - if removal fails.

    • buildImage

      CompletableFuture<String> buildImage(ImageBuildConfig config, Consumer<String> outputConsumer) throws ContainerManagerException
      Builds an image from a Dockerfile or Containerfile.
      Parameters:
      config - Configuration for the image build process.
      outputConsumer - Optional consumer for build output lines.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture holding the ID of the built image.
      Throws:
      ContainerManagerException - if building fails.

    • inspectImage

      CompletableFuture<ImageInfo> inspectImage(String imageIdOrName) throws ContainerManagerException
      Inspects an image and returns detailed information.
      Parameters:
      imageIdOrName - The ID or name/tag of the image to inspect.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture holding the ImageInfo object.
      Throws:
      ContainerManagerException - if inspection fails or image not found.
